ScarabWeb.com offers a wide range of different products from $1.95/month Web Hosting up to Full Managed Enterprise Private Cloud products. all to a very affordable prices. We own our equipment and are located in a Tier IV Datacenter (IRS1075/PCI/SAS70/HIPAA/SOC1 (SSAE16) / SOC2 Type 2 audited).
We are connected through redundant Gig and 10Gig uplinks to 8 carriers (US Signal, Level3, Global Crossing, XO, TW Telecom, TW Cable, HE, Cogent)
